name: Scary Assassin: Horror Game
description:
MalomStudios present,Scary Assassin What is the game about? Scary Assassin 

It consists of escaping from an abandoned house, you are not alone there is someone who will prevent you from escaping but you will be more intelligent.

Get all the keys, you have 5 lives, get away.

But most importantly, have fun.

Controls

The game controls are so basic, but if you didn't know I'll explain.

The letter: (E) is for take things, for example a plate.

The letter: (Q) is for example, you have hidden in a trunk or under a bed, and you want to leave, you simply press that letter and you will come out.

The letter: (G) is for example, you have take a plate and you want to throw to the ground to get a new thing or simply you want the murderer to come, press this letter and that's it!

The letter: (C) is for example that you want to bend over.

Have a nice day!

By: MalomStudios
